title: Wayang Kulit: the shadow puppet theatre of Java
creator_credit: Baylis Glascock Films and Baylis Glascock
brief_description: This film explores parts of an all night performance of the Wayang Kulit, a traditional Javanese puppet play. The characters in the film are from the Mahabharata, a story of Hindu origin, telling of the great war between the five Pendawa brothers who represent good and their cousins - the Korawas, who represent evil.
